title: Os AIML
content:
What Bosada paper was that , I hate my life after that paper. There better be relative grading for this subject else I‚Äôm gonna become a school shooter.

comments.body: Thank god I thought people left early because it was an easy paper.
I love the guy who made the paper for cs people ü•∞

Isa's also were easier for us compared to u guys 
But it balances it out i guess , you guys had it ez for cn

There's a teacher in the AI/ML department who claims to be an industry expert, but he seems to be the opposite. He's not very good at teaching and just wants students to memorize things. It's confusing why he's in the AI/ML department because he teaches basic subjects like Software Engineering, Cloud Computing, and Operating Systems, which many other teachers could handle. He's also the one who creates the question papers for those three subjects.
Just bcoz CN was a copy paper doesn't mean it was easy bruh. 99% ppl didn't see that paper, we also did very bad in CN

It's not about pyqs , the questions were easier compared to us . But what's the point in us fighting üò≠
The one whos fucking is PES
If those questions are considered easier then I don't deserve to live üò≠. But fr fuck this clg. Let us both pray for relative üõê
